workSchedules.title: Work Schedules
workSchedules.description: Manage work schedule templates and assignments for your organization
workSchedules.templateDescription: Define a work schedule template that can be assigned to your organization, teams, or individual employees.
workSchedules.name: Name
workSchedules.hoursPerCycleDescription: Total working hours per cycle (e.g., 40 for weekly)
workSchedules.detailedDescription: Configure hours for each day of the week
workSchedules.homeOfficeDaysDescription: Allowed home office days per cycle
workSchedules.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will also remove all assignments for this template. This action cannot be undone.
workSchedules.noTemplatesDescription: Create a template to define work schedules for your team.
workSchedules.orgLevelDescription: Default work schedule applied to all employees unless overridden
workSchedules.teamLevelDescription: Override the organization default for specific teams
workSchedules.assignOrgDescription: Set the default work schedule for all employees in your organization.
workSchedules.assignTeamDescription: Override the organization default for a specific team.
workSchedules.assignEmployeeDescription: Override the schedule for a specific employee.
workSchedules.removeAssignmentDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this schedule assignment? The affected employees will inherit their schedule from the next level up.

cycle.label: Cycle
cycle.description: The time period for this schedule

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.description: Export organization data for backup or migration

storageNotConfigured.title: Storage Not Configured
storageNotConfigured.description: Please configure S3 storage in the "Storage Settings" tab before creating exports.

employees.label: Employees
employees.description: Names, positions, roles, and team assignments

form.title: Create New Export
form.description: Select the data categories you want to export. The export will be processed in the background and you'll receive an email with a download link when it's ready.
form.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one data category to export
form.submitSuccess: Export request submitted! You will receive an email when it's ready for download.
form.aboutAsync: Exports are processed asynchronously and may take a few minutes
form.aboutEmail: You will receive an email with a download link when ready
form.aboutLinkValidity: Download links are valid for 24 hours
form.aboutStorageDuration: Export files are stored for 30 days
form.aboutOrgDataOnly: Only data from your organization is included

history.title: Export History
history.description: View and manage your previous exports
history.emptyDescription: No exports have been created yet.
history.emptyHint: Create a new export from the "New Export" tab to get started.
history.downloadSuccess: Download link generated. A new email has also been sent.
history.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this export? This will remove the file from storage and cannot be undone.

storage.title: S3 Storage Configuration
storage.description: Configure S3-compatible storage for data exports. Supports AWS S3, MinIO, and other S3-compatible services.
storage.deleteDialogDescription: This will remove the S3 storage configuration. You won't be able to create new exports until you configure storage again. Existing exports will remain in S3 but may become inaccessible.
storage.bucketDescription: The S3 bucket where exports will be stored
storage.endpointDescription: For MinIO or other S3-compatible services. Leave empty for AWS S3.
storage.keepExistingCredentials: Leave empty to keep existing credentials
storage.saveSuccessDescription: Your S3 storage settings have been saved. Test the connection to verify.

welcome.title: Welcome to Z8!
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started with a quick setup. This will only take a few minutes.

features.timeTrackingDesc: Clock in and out, track work hours, and manage time corrections
features.absencesDesc: Request time off, manage vacation days, and track holidays
features.teamDesc: Work with your team, approve requests, and manage employees

organization.title: Set up your organization
organization.subtitle: Create your organization to unlock all features, or skip if you're waiting for an invitation.
organization.createDescription: Set up your own organization and invite your team
organization.skipDescription: If your administrator will invite you to an organization, you can skip this step for now.

profile.title: Complete your profile
profile.subtitle: Help your team recognize you by adding some personal information.
profile.personalInfoDesc: This information will be visible to your team members.
profile.birthdayDesc: Your team can wish you a happy birthday!

workSchedule.title: Set your work schedule
workSchedule.subtitle: Define your working hours to help track time and manage absences accurately.
workSchedule.scheduleDesc: Set your default working hours. You can adjust this later in settings.
workSchedule.hoursPerWeekDesc: Typical full-time is 40 hours per week.
workSchedule.classificationDesc: How you want to track your working hours.

vacationPolicy.title: Set up vacation policy
vacationPolicy.subtitle: Create a vacation policy for your organization. This determines how many days off employees get.
vacationPolicy.cardDesc: Configure vacation allowance for your team. You can customize this later in settings.
vacationPolicy.name: Policy Name
vacationPolicy.nameDesc: A name to identify this policy.
vacationPolicy.annualDaysDesc: Number of vacation days per year.
vacationPolicy.accrualTypeDesc: How vacation days are granted throughout the year.
vacationPolicy.allowCarryoverDesc: Allow unused days to be carried to next year.
vacationPolicy.maxCarryoverDesc: Maximum days that can be carried over.

holidaySetup.title: Set up holidays
holidaySetup.subtitle: Import public holidays for your location. This helps track time off correctly.
holidaySetup.cardDesc: Select your country to import public holidays. You can customize this later in settings.
holidaySetup.countryDesc: Select the country for public holidays.
holidaySetup.presetNameDesc: A name to identify this holiday preset.
holidaySetup.setAsDefaultDesc: Apply this holiday preset to all employees by default.

workTemplates.title: Create work schedule template
workTemplates.subtitle: Set up a work schedule template for your organization. This defines working hours for your team.
workTemplates.cardDesc: Define a standard work schedule. You can customize this later in settings.
workTemplates.name: Template Name
workTemplates.nameDesc: A name to identify this template.
workTemplates.workingDaysDesc: Select which days are work days.
workTemplates.setAsDefaultDesc: Apply this template to all employees by default.
workTemplates.error: Failed to create work schedule template

notifications.title: Set up notifications
notifications.subtitle: Choose how you want to receive updates about approvals, status changes, and team activities.
notifications.pushDesc: Receive instant updates even when you're not using the app.
notifications.pushNotSupported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser
notifications.preferencesDesc: Choose which notifications you want to receive.
notifications.statusUpdatesDesc: When your requests are approved or rejected.
notifications.teamChangesDesc: When team members are added or removed.

complete.title: You're all set!
complete.subtitle: Your account is ready to use. Welcome to the team!
complete.summaryDesc: Here's a summary of your configuration.
complete.exploreDashboardDesc: Get started with time tracking and absence management
complete.inviteTeamDesc: Add colleagues to collaborate and manage time together
